title: Trying to figure out what my suspension message means
body:
Hi I received a notice that my account was permanently suspended with the message: "Due to the actions of your main account and it receiving a permanent suspension on the Boards, all subsequent accounts are also permanently suspended. If you wish to discuss this suspension you can do so by contacting Player Support.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

--Mod Razgriz"

Can anyone tell me what this means? It is very confusing because I have only one account(I made this one since I can't post on the forums with the main one now), and I haven't posted on the boards in over 7 months. I also have never received any suspension before and to my knowledge have only received one warning for negative attitude. So how can my account be perma-banned? If anyone could help I would be very appreciative, I posted a support ticket but Riot has not gotten back to me and all my purchases and time are in that account.

Thanks

replies.body:
Hey ItsBTrue,

I'll work with you in the ticket.

In short, your account was proactively locked due to being linked to another player who earlier in the week posted a ton of inappropriate mature content. As a result, we proactively suspended on both fronts of in-game and boards so we can get the account back to the original owner.

> eazymakaveli3 (NA)  - 15 minutes ago
>wait so tlaking shyt on the forums can get ur game account banned? lol thats just retaded af

I known that for a long time.

I approve 100% !   Have to ask why you think this is a bad rule?  I only wish they would adhere to this quicker and more often, also the other one of getting rid of people who were already Board-Banned not being able to post on any account !   Thanks Riot !
I'll need the name of the account that was banned to be able to look into this for you.
Hi thank you for the reply, the account's name is playmakerbgt.

> [{quoted}](name=ItsBTrue,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=sEWtdb5A,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-04-20T00:34:55.940+0000)
>
> Hi thank you for the reply, the account's name is playmakerbgt.

I looked into this for you and you'll need to continue to wait for a discussion with Player Support via the ticket you submitted.  This isn't something we can help you with on the Boards.   All I can say is a request was made by Riot for us to suspend your account.  They'll have to discuss why with you.

Okay thank you for looking into it.  So you are saying Riot asked you to suspend my account on the boards and because of this my in game account also receives the ban? I'm not really worried about not being able to post on the boards I just want to be able to play with my account.  

One last thing, when I posted in the support ticket they responded saying: "For security reasons, we are not able to assist with an Account Recovery while you are logged into a League of Legends account on our Support Site.

In order to proceed further, please provide me with a different email (one that is not associated with any League account). We will create a new ticket for you using this alternate email address, where you can reply and proceed further with your recovery request."

I'm not sure why this is but I provided them with a different email and have not heard back.  All of my messages in the thread are marked as "REDACTED". Does this mean they did not receive the message of my new email and maybe that is why I have not received anything back from them?  They said they would open a new ticket but if I'm not allowed to sign in with that email how will I talk with them?

Does this mean they did not receive the message of my new email and maybe that is why I have not received anything back from them?  They said they would open a new ticket but if I'm not allowed to sign in with that email how will I talk with them?

Redacted means they're protecting potentially sensitive information in the prior messages until they know you're actually the owner of the account in question.

But how will it work with the new email?  Because won't I have to create an account with that email to see the ticket and then doesn't that leave me in the same situation where they can't discuss account recovery since I'm logged in with a League account?  

This whole situation is very frustrating because of the amount of hoops I have to jump through just to get a straight answer for what happened and if there is anything I can do about it.

I don't work in Player Support so I can't answer these questions for you.

Are you able to connect me with someone who can help with this situation?  I understand the security but I am able to verify the account is mine in many ways I just need to know I am taking the correct steps and making progress in coming to a solution.

> [{quoted}](name=ItsBTrue,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=sEWtdb5A,comment-id=00000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-04-20T01:07:21.429+0000)

As previously stated, the only way you can discuss this is via a ticket to Player Support.  I can not assist you any more than what I've already said via the Boards.  There is no other way to deal with this situation.

To be clear, as someone whose account is permanently suspended from the Boards, you're not allowed to post on other accounts.  The only reason I haven't suspended the account you're on now is to explain to you how to contact Riot regarding this.  I can not assist you any further.  Further posting on this account will result in its suspension as well.
